welcome_message_body: Welcome to Woods Cross, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and delicious local cuisine. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The dedicated terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport provides a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
